description:
Use an existing, pre-built AWS ECR image.

This builder attempts to find an image by repository and tag in the
specified region. If found, it will pass along the image information
to the next step.

This builder will not modify the image. 

If you wish to rename or retag an image, please use the "docker-pull" component
in conjunction with the "aws-ecr" registry option.
name: aws-ecr-pull

optionalFields.Synopsis: **Note**: This is a temporary field that enables overriding the `architecture` output attribute. Valid values are: `"x86_64"`, `"arm64"`
the AWS region the ECR repository is in
optionalFields.Summary: if not set uses the environment variable AWS_REGION or AWS_REGION_DEFAULT.

outputAttrsHelp: Output attributes can be used in your `waypoint.hcl` as [variables](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables) via [`artifact`](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables/artifact) or [`deploy`](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables/deploy).

requiredFields.Synopsis: the tag of the image to pull
